en.title: FusonExcel Wows Visitors at Melbourne Mind Body Spirit Winter Festival!
en.content:
REPORT BY AUSTRALIAN COUNTRY LICENSEE VASU.

Melbournians who visited the Mind Body Spirit Winter Festival got an opportunity to experience the amazing wonders of FE's range of scalar energy products during the recent long weekend holidays. The occasion was the 4 days Mind Body Spirit Winter Festival at the Melbourne Exhibition Centre, 05th – 08th June. Some 14,000 visitors visited the festival and a constant crowd came to FE booths, wanting to know about scalar energy and FE's range of scalar products and benefits. 

It was a fun time for visitors and FE members alike with the amazing demonstration and the accompanying expressions of surprise – wonderful, did you see that, it works, it is funny, it is freaky, etc. The first day of the expo saw sales of Quantum Pendants and Flasks to many exhibitors who came to know FusionExcel during the previous Melbourne Expo in November last year. 

The mobile phone test and the effects of electromagnetic frequencies (EMF) was one that impressed the visitors with an immediate and noticeable effect on consumers minds at the expo. Most of them were not aware of the dangers associated with mobile phones. The preventive aspect of the Quantum Pendant in restoring the energy depleted was easily understood and recognized.

A number of people were lifted off their chairs, the crowd wowed by the amazing strength of the Quantum Pendant. New visitors were keen to learn more about the pendant and scalar energy and took away brochures with an intention to acquire the products. Several prospective distributors have indicated interest to join the business as well as take the business to other countries.

A special mention of appreciation to FE leader Che Anrossi for facilitating the expo logistics. Acknowledgement and thanks to all the team members - Arjan, Roy, Matt, Lisa, Hillary Yi Ying, Anrossi and Rubina. Newest and youngest FE member Rubina joined the expo and thoroughly enjoyed the event.
